title: background music 2 - game music (alien, diablo, gits, naruto)
description:
background music 2 - game music (alien, diablo, gits, naruto)

While reading or working (behind the computer or offline), the silence is sometimes just too silent, too distractive. Background music helps by providing non-invasive background noise. In this volume some electronic/classic background music from games (alien, diablo, ghost in the shell, naruto, otogirisou, ninja gaiden, starwars)

Enjoy!

violineas	

--
more electronic background music: search for:
- Trentemoller - the last resort
- Two lone swordsmen (TLS, Andrew Weatherall)
- Royksopp

game music:
- google: khinsider downloads

background music which is a bit less electronic and a bit more classical/pop/rock: search for:
- god speed you black emperor
- mogwai

Samples of all artists can be heard on Allmusic
